issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
- Debug a iOS app onto device/simulator.
- After the app is suspended at the breakpoints, resume (F8) the execution.
- Now skip all breakpoints : Run > Skip All Breakpoints.
- Try to run through the same scenario - the thread should not be suspended at the breakpoints now.
fields.summary: iOS: Debugger suspends the thread though all breakpoints are suspended

comments.body:
Verified the debugger for *skipping all breakpoint* functionality.
Hence closing the ticket.

Test Environment:
Titanium SDK: 3.5.0.v20141222103320
Appc-Studio:  3.4.1 GA
Titanium CLI: 3.4.1 GA
Alloy : 1.5.1 GA
Xcode : 6.1
OS: OSX 10.10.1
Device : iPhone 6plus (iOS 8.1)
